statements: SELECT * FROM communication_logs;
SELECT log_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message, timestamp FROM communication_logs;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message FROM communication_logs WHERE log_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM communication_logs GROUP BY sender_id;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE sender_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, COUNT(*) as total_messages FROM communication_logs GROUP BY sender_id, receiver_id HAVING total_messages > 5
SELECT DISTINCT sender_id FROM communication_logs ORDER BY sender_id ASC
SELECT sender_id, MAX(timestamp) as latest_message FROM communication_logs GROUP BY sender_id ORDER BY latest_message DESC
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE sender_id = 3 AND receiver_id = 4 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE department = 'Marketing';
SELECT member_name, email FROM team_members ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT member_name, department FROM team_members WHERE department = 'Sales' AND member_id = 3;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message FROM communication_logs WHERE sender_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT member_name, department FROM team_members WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT message, timestamp FROM communication_logs WHERE sender_id = 2 AND receiver_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM team_members ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT member_name, email FROM team_members WHERE department = 'Engineering' AND member_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM communication_logs WHERE log_id = 2;
SELECT message FROM communication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE sender_id = 3 AND receiver_id = 4;
SELECT log_id, message FROM communication_logs WHERE sender_id = 3 OR receiver_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sender_id, count(*) FROM communication_logs GROUP BY sender_id
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE sender_id = 1 OR receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT message FROM communication_logs WHERE log_id = 3
SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM communication_logs
SELECT * FROM communication_logs;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM communication_logs WHERE log_id = 100;
SELECT name, email, role FROM team_members ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT team_id, team_name, creation_date FROM teams WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT type_name, description FROM communication_types WHERE type_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, creation_date FROM teams ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT name, role FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT message FROM communication_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT type_name, description FROM communication_types ORDER BY type_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM team_members
SELECT member_name, email FROM team_members WHERE member_id = 1
SELECT team_name, team_lead_id FROM teams ORDER BY team_name DESC
SELECT message_id, team_id, message_text FROM team_messages LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE sender_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT message, timestamp FROM communication_logs WHERE receiver_id = 456 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT log_id, sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM communication_logs WHERE log_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM communication_logs WHERE message ILIKE '%important%'
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM communication_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
